articles.title: Greetings to President of Malta
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Malta
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Marie Louise Coleiro Preca, president of Malta, on Sunday on the occasion of its independence day. 
					 The message wished the friendly people of Malta steady progress and prosperity. It expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to Nicaraguan FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Nicaraguan FM
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to Samuel Santos Lopez, foreign minister of Nicaragua, on September 15 to mark the 193rd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow strong in the common interests of the two peoples, wishing the Nicaraguan foreign minister success in his work for the development of foreign relations of the country.

articles.title: Young Korean People Pledge to Remain Loyal to Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun
articles.content:
Young Korean People Pledge to Remain Loyal to Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The young vanguard held a meeting at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday to thoroughly carry out the important tasks set forth in "Let Youth Become Vanguard Fighters Intensely Loyal to the Songun Revolutionary Cause of the Party", the historic letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the 4th meeting of primary organization cadres of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league in Pyongyang and local areas, exemplary members of the youth league, officials concerned, the participants in the 4th meeting and youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Un's letter is a militant banner which should be adhered to in preparing the young people to be vanguard fighters remaining unfailingly loyal to the Party's revolutionary cause of Songun and building the youth league into the young vanguard organization, the powerful one of the Party, in the era of Songun under the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He noted that President Kim Il Sung set forth the unique idea attaching importance to youth and successfully embodied it since he embarked on the road of the revolutionary struggle in his early years and brought up the young people to be the vanguard of the revolution and reliable reserves of the Party.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, who remained true to the idea and intention of the President, gave the torch of the revolution to the youth and glorified the youth league as the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, he added.
					
					 He called for dynamically advancing toward the final victory of the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the flag of the youth league, united close around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Speakers there renewed their steel-strong faith and will to remain true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Eleven Advances into Knock-out Stage in Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Eleven Advances into Knock-out Stage in Asian Games 
 Inchon, September 20 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- There took place a match on Saturday between the DPRK and Hong Kong of China which belong to Group C of the women's football in the 17th Asian Games. 
					 The DPRK team trounced the Hong Kong rival 5:0. 
					
					 After a winning streak to come first in the group, the DPRK team advanced into the next stage game.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Om Yun Chol Sets New World Record in Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Om Yun Chol Sets New World Record in Asian Games 
 Inchon, September 20 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Weightlifter Om Yun Chol, People's Sportsman of the DPRK, bagged a gold medal in the 56kg category of men's weightlifting in the 17th Asian Games. 
					 The matches brought together weightlifters from the DPRK, Thailand, Kazakhstan, Vietnam and other countries. 
					
					 Om who snatched 128kg jerked 170kg to set a new world record. 
					
					 He successfully lifted 298kg in total and won a gold medal. 
					
					 He said reporters that he pictured for himself the benevolent image of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un the moment he won the gold medal. Thanks to Kim Jong Un's trust he could win every game, Om added.

articles.title: DPRK Team Wins AFC U-16 Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Team Wins AFC U-16 Championship
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's football team came first in the 2014 AFC U-16 Championship after defeating its south Korean rival in the finals on Saturday. 
					 The DPRK team suffered a 1:0 loss in the first half. However, the eleven took the offensive and in the 52nd minute Pak Yong Gwan passed the ball to Han Kwang Song in the goalmouth who kicked it into the net. 
					
					 The second goal came as a south Korean back missed the ball and DPRK player Choe Song Hyok made a strong kick into the corner of the goalpost to make the ball land in the net in the 66th minute. 
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK team notched up a 2:1 victory. 
					
					 It will take part in the FIFA U-17 World Cup in 2015.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 14th Pyongyang International Film Festival visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The delegations of different countries and regions to take part in the 10th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Sunday.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues in humblest reverence and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Mission for Global Peace and Security
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Mission for Global Peace and Security
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. constantly targets the DPRK, and China and Russia contain the U.S. with the DPRK as a shield while the U.S. tries to make the DPRK a victim in checking the influence of China and Russia in the Asia-Pacific. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 If the DPRK is weak in its military capabilities and if it allows the imperialists' interference in its internal affairs and aggression yielding to their coercion and pressure, not only Northeast Asia but the rest of the world will plunge into a great upheaval. This was proved by the history at the end of the 19th century and in the first half of the 20th century.
					
					 The DPRK advances towards the building of a thriving nation. It is a way for achieving peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and preventing the U.S. imperialists from igniting a new world war.
					
					 Nobody can deny the historical significance of the contribution the DPRK makes to the peace and security on the peninsula and in the rest of the world as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 All joint nuclear war exercises being ceaselessly conducted by the U.S. are reckless moves of those who are taken aback by the might of the DPRK firmly protecting the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the world as a nuclear weapons state. They are also a revelation of the U.S. intention to revenge the DPRK for making its world domination strategy go bust.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will dynamically advance toward the building of a thriving nation with noble mission responsible for the peace and security on the Korean peninsula in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world so as not to cause a grave disaster the world may face in case the DPRK, situated in the place of strategic importance, gets weak.

articles.title: U.S.-touted "Annihilation of Terrorists" Is Ad for Aggression and Plunder: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-touted "Annihilation of Terrorists" Is Ad for Aggression and Plunder: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, U.S. President Obama said it is time to track down the Islamic State. He blustered the U.S. would form international coalition forces and carry out an air-strike against it and trace to the end and catch terrorists who threaten the U.S., adding there can never be a shelter for those posing threats to the U.S. He even bluffed that the U.S. would expand air raid on Iraq and strike Syria beyond the border. He also announced that the U.S. would dispatch 475 more U.S. troops to Iraq.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun says this is a revelation of the U.S. invariable ambition to dominate the world by force by carrying out air raid on Syria and other sovereign states once again under the pretext of "busting terrorists".
					
					 The U.S. tries to establish order and political system it favors by toppling independent countries by mobilizing massive armed forces while talking about "annihilation of terrorists", a brigandish act of aggression and state-sponsored terrorism, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 "Anti-terrorist war" kicked up by the U.S. is an illegal act contrary to the UN Charter and international law.
					
					 The U.S. intends to justify "anti-terrorist war" as "international contributions" to "freedom", "democracy" and "peace" but it can never conceal its aggressive and reactionary nature.
					
					 As proven by the results of the "anti-terrorist war" waged by the U.S. in Iraq, Afghanistan, etc. over the past ten odd years, it is as clear as noonday that the projected air raid will kill many innocent civilians once again.
					
					 The world will be noisier and plunge into a whirlpool of pandemonium due to the U.S. moves to expand "anti-terrorist war" aimed to establish American-style order for world domination.

articles.title: Journalists and Media Persons Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Journalists and Media Persons Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Samjiyon, September 21 (KCNA) -- Journalists and other media persons in the field of media from across the country toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 They held a starting ceremony before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo on Sept. 17 and marched to Pochonbo.
					
					 They went round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, the then police post of the Japanese imperialists, post office, sub-county office, etc. associated with feats of President Kim Il Sung who brought the dawn of national liberation to the people who groaned under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 They climbed Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, on Sept. 19. They visited leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp. They laid bouquets before the mosaic portraying the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to it.
					
					 They went round the headquarters log cabin, room for members of the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army, the shallow well used by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and trees bearing revolutionary slogans written by her.
					
					 They toured the Chongbong, Konchang, Pegaebong bivouacs, the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area, Mupho bivouac and battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They conducted political and cultural work and creative activities including meetings to hear impressions of reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them, poem recital, meetings to hear impressions of tour and express impressions of famous works on the theme of revolutionary traditions and discussion on the seed in literary works. They also camped out.
					
					 They arrived at the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site on Sunday, laid bouquets and flowers before the statue of the President and paid tribute to him.
					
					 There took place a meeting of the marchers at the Samjiyon Grand Monument that day to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Sepho Tableland for Two Years
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Sepho Tableland for Two Years
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- It is two years since the new history of change started in Sepho area.
					 Service personnel and people of the DPRK turned out as one under the grandiose plan of Marshal Kim Jong Un who initiated the reclamation of the tableland as the first grand nature-remaking project in the new century of Juche on September 22, Juche 101(2012). As a result, the barren land is now undergoing change beyond recognition thanks to their heroic struggle.
					
					 For the past two years the members of Construction Shock Brigade 922 made eye-opening achievements, going through manifold difficulties.
					
					 They finished reclaiming more than 50 000 hectares of tableland covering Sepho, Phyonggang and Ichon counties and created man-made pasture amounting to 98 percent of the project and nature-made pasture equivalent to 77 percent of the project.
					
					 They also created more than 600 hectares of windbreak and more than 12 700 hectares of pasture protection forest and pushed forward the construction of reservoirs, dwelling houses, hotels, stockbreeding research institute, epizootic prevention center, domestic animal sties and roads extending more than one thousand of kilometers, thus opening a bright prospect for building a large-scale stockbreeding base.

articles.title: S. Korean Farmers Struggle against Opening of Rice Market
articles.content:
S. Korean Farmers Struggle against Opening of Rice Market
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean farmers staged actions in protest against the puppet authorities' moves to open the rice market in Kwangju and different areas of South Jolla Province on Sept. 18, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Delegates of various farmers' organizations and members of the farmers' associations of more than 10 sub-counties held a meeting outside the building of the Haenam County Office.
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It said they would turn out in the large-scale protest with the on-going struggle as an occasion.
					
					 It stressed the need to stage various actions in different parts of the country to check the opening of rice market.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, they took part in the demonstration of motorcars.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Guinean Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Guinean Organization
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea released a bulletin on September 11 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk's demise.
					 In an article titled "Shining life" the bulletin said though the life of Kim Jong Suk was short, she left an indelible trace in the mind of the Korean people.
					
					 She devoted her all to the good health and wellbeing of President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended his idea and line.
					
					 She is alive as the incarnation devotedly safeguarding the leader in the mind of the Korean people, the article said, and went on:
					
					 After joining the Korean People's Revolutionary Army led by the President in September 1935, she fully displayed rare military wisdom and stratagem, matchless pluck and bravery and marksmanship worthy of a crack shot in a number of battles during the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle, thus gaining fame as an anti-Japanese war hero.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea, she visited every nook and corner of the country, true to the intention of the President, arousing the people to build a new country.
					
					 She made a great contribution to consolidating the military foundation for building a new country, in particular.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in various countries on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They were held by the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), a doctor association in Cabinda Province, Angola, a company of Angola, a design supervision office in Oromia Province, Ethiopia, hospitals of Ethiopia and a company of Malaysia from Sept. 2 to 5.
					
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said that the DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung, the country which leader Kim Jong Il consolidated as a political, ideological and military power with his Songun politics, is clearly demonstrating the advantages of socialism and inevitability of its victory.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK is a country with a strong sense of independence, a country for the people recognized by the world.
					
					 The general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said the DPRK is a country where the society is modeled on the Juche idea and the state takes care of the people's living in a responsible manner.
					
					 The general manager of an Angolan company paid highest tribute to the President and Kim Jong Il who performed immortal exploits in founding and strengthening the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked by Newspapers of Uruguay, Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked by Newspapers of Uruguay, Nepal
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Uruguayan and Nepali newspapers carried special write-ups with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud on Sept. 9 devoted a whole page to articles titled "Nation-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung" and "Socialist Korea, people's country". 
					
					 It said that the Korean people are holding in high esteem Kim Il Sung as the eternal President of the DPRK for his great nation-building exploits. 
					
					 Noting that leader Kim Jong Il steadily developed the DPRK founded by the President with the Songun leadership, it said Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the people's country. 
					
					 The strong foundation of politics, military and economy laid by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il provides a sure guarantee for the DPRK to dynamically advance along the road of victory in the future, too, it added. 
					
					 The Nepali newspaper Arpan on Sept. 5 carried an article titled "Great Leader President Kim Il Sung" praising him for liberating the country, winning the victory in the war and building the nation. 
					
					 The Nepali paper Gorkha Express on Sept. 9 carried an article titled "Invincible socialist power" saying that the DPRK became an invincible socialist power thanks to the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is demonstrating its might thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, the paper spoke highly of the Songun leadership exploits he performed by leading the struggle for increasing the capabilities for national defence, construction of economic power, standoff with the U.S. and the construction of a highly civilized socialist country.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked by Syrian Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked by Syrian Media 
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Syrian TV and radio broadcasting services and newspapers carried special reports on Sept. 7 and 9 to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The Syria TV Channel aired the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and pictures documenting the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It praised the President for founding and developing the DPRK and Kim Jong Il for firmly defending socialism under the unfurled banner of Songun. 
					
					 It also introduced in detail the exploits of Kim Jong Un who is adding luster to the DPRK as a country for the people which world progressives look up to by carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started and advanced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Syria Radio broadcast an article titled "On the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK". 
					
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Thawrah in an article titled "DPRK greeting victorious and glorious 66th anniversary" said the DPRK firmly defended socialism enjoying trust and support from its people, standing undeterred when the Soviet Union and East European socialist countries collapsed late in the last century. 
					
					 The DPRK has strong nuclear deterrence and manufactures and launches satellites, the paper added. 
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath in an article titled "On the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK, bulwark of socialism" said that the DPRK has vigorously pushed forward the building of a thriving socialist nation by dint of the single-minded unity despite the ceaseless sanctions and blockade by the imperialist allied forces.

articles.title: Portavoz de delegacion nortena a contacto Norte-Sur condena a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Portavoz de delegacion nortena a contacto Norte-Sur condena a autoridades surcoreanas
 Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las autoridades surcoreanas actuan cinicamente en lugar de reflexionarse de su campana psicologica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz de la delegacion de la parte nortena al contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea dio el dia 20 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas excusan cinicamente que el lanzamiento de volantes no  tiene que ver nada consigo hablando como si observaran el acuerdo del contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur.
					
					 Y expusieron descaradamente la posicion de  no poder parar el lanzamiento de volantes y otras campanas psicologicas anti-RPDC, por la "peculiaridad de su regimen" y "derecho fundamental".
					
					 Lo mas intolerable es que ellas difunden un rumor de que en el primer contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur, la parte surena "convencio" a la parte nortena sobre la imposibilidad de la solucion del problema del lanzamiento de volantes por la "peculiaridad de su regimen".
					
					 Sabra bien la verdad si se le pregunta a Kim Kyu Hyon, delegado-jefe de la parte surena de aquel entonces.
					
					 Es contradictorio formar la confianza y promover la reconciliacion recurriendo  obstinadamente a las calumnias y difamaciones a los connacionales.
					
					 El lanzamiento de volantes con contenidos difamantes a la maxima dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC, deviene el acto mas hostil que impide el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					 Por tal motivo, en el primer contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur, nuestra parte presento el tema de parar las calumnias e difamaciones a su contraparte como demanda primordial para el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Todos los politicos que desean acabar con la historia de la division nacional y todas las personas juiciosas que se preocupan de veras por la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion, deberan esforzarse, ante todo, por crear clima favorable a la mejora de las relaciones N-S.
					
					 Para realizar el dialogo, hay que crear la confianza y anteponer el clima para la mejora de relaciones bilaterales.
					
					 Si las autoridades surcoreanas recurren a las calumnias e difamaciones a su contraparte so pretexto de la "peculiaridad de su regimen" y utilizan la astucia para evadirse de la "responsabilidad", nunca se mejoraran las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Nosotros observaremos agudamente como las autoridades surcoreanas tratan el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC, previsto el dia 21, por las escorias humanas.
					
					 Chongwadae tomara la decision practica de suspender sin condiciones el lanzamiento de volantes si es sincera su declaracion de crear la confianza N-S.
					
					 He aqui la via para el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.

articles.title: Equipo de futbol femenino de RPDC avanza a la fase de knock-out
articles.content:
Equipo de futbol femenino de RPDC avanza a la fase de knock-out
 Inchon, 20 de septiembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- La competencia realizada el dia 20 entre las selecciones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Hong Kong de China pertenecientes al grupo C del futbol femenino de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos termino con el marcador de 5:0 a favor del primero.
					 Asi el equipo coreano avanzo a la fase de knock-out al ocupar el primer lugar en el grupo C.

articles.title: Om Yun Chol establece nuevo record mundial en 17o juegos asiaticos
articles.content:
Om Yun Chol establece nuevo record mundial en 17o juegos asiaticos
 Inchon, 20 de septiembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El deportista del Pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Om Yun Chol gano la medalla de oro en la competencia de la division de 56kg(m) del levantamiento de pesas de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					 En esta competencia participaron los pesistas de varios paises y regiones inclusive la RPDC, Tailandia, Kazajstan y Vietnam.
					
					 Om Yun Chol establecio un nuevo record mundial levantando 128kg en arranque y 170kg en envion, en total 298kg.
					
					 A la pregunta de periodistas sobre la clave e impresion de la victoria, Om dijo que se veia  primero la imagen amable del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el momento de ganar la medalla de oro y agrego que gracias a la confianza del Mariscal, obtenia sucesivamente la victoria en  las competencias.

articles.title: Equipo de RPDC ocupa primer lugar en campeonato sub-16 de CAF 2014
articles.content:
Equipo de RPDC ocupa primer lugar en campeonato sub-16 de CAF 2014
 Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La seleccion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ocupo el primer lugar en el campeonato sub-16 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2014.
					 El dia 20, hubo la final entre las selecciones de la RPDC y el Sur de Corea.
					
					 A los minutos 52 y 66 el once de la RPDC marco dos goles por el numero 9 Han Kwang Song y el numero 10 Choe Song Hyok.
					
					 El partido termino con la nota de 2:1 a favor del equipo de la RPDC.
					
					 Por eso, la RPDC participara en el campeonato mundial sub-17 de la FIFA que se efectuara en 2015.
